quote: The best and worst of times... I drew bib number one. We were ready to go for the 7 p.m. start... when the trail forked, I called a quick 'Ha!' to go left, but the team veered right, and I dug my brake into the glare ice beneath the fresh, loose snow.
By the time we left for the second leg at 8 a.m., three teams had scratched from the race. It was -17 with reports of a -40 degree wind chill...
